title: 服务端崩溃lQAQ
author: whiteyu1314
txt_content:
Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine.
Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit.
Invalid maximum heap size: -Xmx4096M
The specified size exceeds the maximum representable size.
就这样qwq

replies.author: 南柯郡守
replies.txt_content: xmx是最大 xms是最小  是不是弄反了

replies.author: whiteyu1314
replies.txt_content:
ItIsEnderman 发表于 2020-7-12 21:28
尝试重新安装Java？

https://javadl.oracle.com/webapps/download/AutoDL?BundleId=242060_3d5a2bb8f8d442 ...
呃，大佬，之前的那个java直接放到回收站然后删除就好了吗，还是怎么做qwq

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
whiteyu1314 发表于 2020-7-12 21:41
呃，大佬，之前的那个java直接放到回收站然后删除就好了吗，还是怎么做qwq ...
控制面板或者系统设置里面找到，卸载，然后再安装新的；或者，直接安装新的，它会提示你卸载旧的，这时候确认卸载就行了。

replies.txt_content:
